name: TKO [C64]
description:
PRESS "F" FULL SCREEN

Player 1: Keyboard

← → -  Move        ↑ - Jump         ↓ -  Jumpthru        "A" - Shoot ink

Player 2: Gamepad

← → -  Move        "A" - Jump     "Left shoulder trigger"- Jumpthru       "X" - Shoot ink

MENU:

"5" - Insert Credit

"1" - Start Game

En TKO uno o dos jugadores encarnan los personajes de Tak y Tok, dos pequeños pulpos espaciales que intentan devolver al mundo su color original. 
Los malvados Akos, en su supremacía absoluta de poder, intentarán eliminarnos a toda costa. Tendremos que superar 100 niveles usando únicamente nuestra tinta y derrotar al rey supremo Kato.

In TKO one or two players embody the characters of Tak and Tok, two small space octopuses that try to return the original color to the world.
The evil Akos, in their absolute supremacy of power, will try to eliminate us at all costs. We will have to overcome 100 levels using only our ink and defeat the supreme king Kato.
